title: Social Competency Strengthening Program Through Arts-Integrated Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic artistic activities and foundational understanding of STEM fields
context.additional_context: A program for professionals in medical, legal, or technical fields to enhance their capacity to design arts-integrated education for elementary students, with smartphone-based learning support in non-PC environments.

learning_goals: Learners can develop social studies-integrated activity plans using art-integrated instructional design principles
Learners can propose at least three alternative material solutions for art activities in resource-limited settings
Learners can create instructional design improvement plans based on peer feedback through formative assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
